title: Requires builders to include the school district on the building permit application
summary: Requires builders to include, on any building permit application, the name of the community school district in which the proposed dwelling or dwelling units will be located, the number of families that will occupy the dwelling or dwelling units, and an estimate of the number of child occupants of compulsory school age.

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  administrative code of the city of New York, in
         relation to requirements on the construction of new housing for school
         district purposes

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The administrative code of the city of New York is amended
    2  by adding a new section 28-105.12.9 to read as follows:
    3    S 28-105.12.9 DISCLOSURE OF COMMUNITY SCHOOL DISTRICT INFORMATION. ANY
    4  APPLICATION SUBMITTED TO THE COMMISSIONER PURSUANT TO  SECTION  28-105.5
    5  OF  THIS  ARTICLE FOR A PERMIT FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF ANY NEW DWELLING,
    6  AS DEFINED IN SUBDIVISION FOUR OF SECTION FOUR OF THE MULTIPLE  DWELLING
    7  LAW,  OR  FOR  THE  ADDITION TO, CHANGE OF USE OR OCCUPANCY OF, OR RENO-
    8  VATION TO AN EXISTING BUILDING THAT  WILL  CAUSE  IT  TO  HAVE  DWELLING
    9  UNITS,  SHALL  SPECIFY:  (1)  THE COMMUNITY SCHOOL DISTRICT IN WHICH THE
   10  DWELLING OR DWELLING UNITS ARE LOCATED; (2) THE NUMBER OF FAMILIES  THAT
   11  WILL  OCCUPY  THE DWELLING OR DWELLING UNITS; AND (3) AN ESTIMATE OF THE
   12  NUMBER OF CHILDREN OF COMPULSORY SCHOOL AGE, AS DEFINED  IN  SUBDIVISION
   13  ELEVEN  OF SECTION TWO OF THE EDUCATION LAW, THAT WILL OCCUPY THE DWELL-
   14  ING OR DWELLING UNITS. NO LATER THAN TEN DAYS AFTER THE APPROVAL OF  THE
   15  APPLICATION FOR THE PERMIT, THE COMMISSIONER SHALL FORWARD SUCH INFORMA-
   16  TION TO THE NEW YORK CITY DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION.
   17    THE  DEPARTMENT  OF  BUILDINGS,  IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF
   18  CITY PLANNING, SHALL PROMULGATE REGULATIONS FOR DETERMINING  THE  NUMBER
   19  OF  ESTIMATED CHILDREN AND FAMILIES AUTHORIZED TO OCCUPY EACH NEW DWELL-
   20  ING OR DWELLING UNIT.
   21    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day after
   22  it shall have become a law.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
